def solve(s, m, n):
    return s[n::-1] + s[n+1:] if m == 0 else s[:m] + s[n:m-1:-1] + s[n+1:]

def solve(st,a,b):
    str = st[a:b+1]
    st = st.replace(st[a:b+1], str[::-1])
    return st

def solve(st,a,b):
    c = st[a:b+1]
    front = st[:a]
    back = st[b+1::]
    
    everything =  front + c[::-1] + back
    return everything

def solve(st,a,b):
    str=st[a:b+1]
    str_new=str[::-1]
    res=st.replace(str,str_new)
    return res
